tool_description: Manages app store listing localization including translation, cultural adaptation, and region-specific optimization for multiple markets.

source_language.description: Source language code (e.g., en, es, fr)

content_to_localize.description: Content fields to localize: title, short_description, full_description, keywords

cultural_adaptation.description: Whether to apply cultural adaptations beyond translation

error_messages: Unsupported language: One or more target languages are not supported.
Invalid source language: Source language code is not recognized.
Content field invalid: Content field must be one of: title, short_description, full_description, keywords.
Missing source content: Required source content fields are empty.
Translation limit exceeded: Too many target languages specified.
usage: Specify source_language, target_languages, and content_to_localize along with all source content. Set cultural_adaptation for region-specific optimization. Returns localized content for each target language.

localized_content.description: Localized content by language in format 'language:field:content'

cultural_adaptations.description: Cultural adaptations applied for each language

keyword_translations.description: Translated and localized keywords by language

localization_quality_score.description: Quality score of localization from 0 to 100

localization_summary.description: Summary of localization process and results
